title: Inconsistent colors?
body: I generated colors with 2 of the wallpaper you used and the color palette are a lot different. Thats not a problem but the problem is terminal colors are unbearable, cant see half the thing
author: LynXHashib

comments.body:
Well, I use terminal all the time and I don't have this issue. Do you have this problem with one particular wallpaper or it's common with others too?
Can you send me wallpaper to play with, so I can adjust colors a little if it's needed?

Also next release will contain new cmd line argument ``--bright-offset``, so you can adjust brightness without losing color palette
It happened with all wallpapers. But thank you its fixed now after the latest update.
